page.title: 16Health Care in Orwell
page.content: The{District Nurse}in Milnathort visits the old people and mothers with very young children. She sees the boys and girls at the primary school, too. Her house is in Linden Park Terrace and she has an answering machine that you have to talk to in she is not in. The Nurse came to Milnathort a short time ago and had to find her way to the houses she visits on her rounds. There are no{doctors' surgeries}in our block, but the doctors in{Kinross cover the whole of this area and much more. If your own doctor can't come, then one of the other four will. Dr Derek Anderson has a green light on his car and he goes to help where there has been a road accident. There are no{dentists}in our block. A{chiropodist}visits the district now in a new mobile clinic. Children, as well as older people attend it.
